Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora to sharpish turn. Clay fine pink-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Production date: 196 BC (see N. Badoud, Le temps de Rhodes, 2015, 142.)
Curator's comments: Name Tharsipolis. Previously unattested die. Trimmed.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0838)
